title: CreateProjectArgs
description: Schema for create_project tool arguments. Creates a new Brain memory project with required code_path and optional memories_path.

code_path.description: Code directory path (use ~ for home). Required.

memories_path.description: Memories directory path. Options: 'DEFAULT' (${default_memories_location}/${name}), 'CODE' (${code_path}/docs), or absolute path. Defaults to 'DEFAULT'.
